ðŸ“– Summary: Blue95 is a Linux distribution that aims to recreate the look and feel of Windows 95 on a modern and lightweight desktop environment. It is based on Fedora Atomic Xfce and incorporates tweaks from Universal Blue to provide a usable out-of-the-box experience, including codecs and automatic updates. A live ISO is available for testing the distribution without installation.
